name: part_011
file: tmp_【3Dライブ】重大発表!？何やらゲストも参戦してくれるらしい…⚡【#おかゆ重大発表 ⧸ ホロライブ】 [LazLAQUMCzI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: Nekomata Okayu addresses the audience, thanking them for listening to her previous song 'Adieu Salon' and preparing to announce a new original track.
Nekomata Okayu performs her new original song 'Doku-Hai Swallow'.

subtitles.original: はい、ということで、改めてここまで聴いてくださった皆さん、
subtitles.english: Yes, and once again, to everyone who's been listening so far,

subtitles.original: ねこまたおかゆですよ〜
subtitles.english: it's Nekomata Okayu!

subtitles.original: アデューサロン聴いてくださってありがとうございました
subtitles.english: Thank you for listening to "Adieu Salon."

subtitles.original: やっぱね、アデューサロンは、
subtitles.english: You know, for "Adieu Salon,"

subtitles.original: プルル〜って電話が来るところ、やっぱみんな大好きだと思うんで
subtitles.english: I think everyone really loves the part where the phone rings.

subtitles.original: ちょっとね、電話のセリフを言うのが、ちょっと一番の山場というか、ね
subtitles.english: Saying the lines on the phone is like the biggest highlight, or something like that.

subtitles.original: 一番ドキドキしながら、
subtitles.english: I always feel like it's the part where I'm most nervous

subtitles.original: こう歌うというか喋るところだなといつも思っております
subtitles.english: while singing or talking.

subtitles.original: はい。ということでですね、
subtitles.english: Yes. So,

subtitles.original: あの〜今までオリジナル曲たくさん歌わせていただいたんですが...
subtitles.english: I've performed many original songs so far, but...

subtitles.original: ここからですね、なんとまだ未発表のオリジナル曲の発表となります！
subtitles.english: From here, I'm going to announce a brand new original song!

subtitles.original: え〜、いいですか？発表しちゃっていいですか？
subtitles.english: Um, is it okay? Can I go ahead and announce it?

subtitles.original: では、え〜ドゥルルルルルルルル... はい！ジャン！
subtitles.english: Then, um... [drumroll]... Yes! Ta-da!

subtitles.original: え〜今回新しく歌わせていただきます、「毒杯スワロウ」！
subtitles.english: The new song I'll be singing is "Doku-Hai Swallow"!

subtitles.original: お〜、こちらの楽曲...
subtitles.english: Oh, this song...

subtitles.original: あ、なんか暗くなっちゃったｗ
subtitles.english: Ah, it's suddenly gotten dark (lol).

subtitles.original: 待って待って、待って、まだ喋りたいことあるから、
subtitles.english: Wait, wait! I still have more to say.

subtitles.original: あの、こちらの楽曲は...
subtitles.english: Um, this song...

subtitles.original: え〜僕も「歌ってみた」で歌わせていただいている「失楽ペトリ」という楽曲を作っている、
subtitles.english: It was written for me by Nanahoshi Kangengakudan, who also created "Shitsuraku Petri,"

subtitles.original: 七星管弦楽団さんという方に書き下ろししていただきました！
subtitles.english: a song I've covered before!

subtitles.original: じゃあ、あの照明係さん、今から歌いますんで、え〜電気消してもらっていいですよ
subtitles.english: Alright, lighting staff, I'm going to sing now, so you can turn off the lights.

subtitles.original: では、聴いてください、「毒杯スワロウ」！
subtitles.english: Now, please listen to "Doku-Hai Swallow"!

subtitles.original: 毒杯スワロウ / 作詞：岩見 陸 作曲・編曲：七星管弦楽団
subtitles.english: Doku-Hai Swallow / Lyrics: Iwami Riku; Composition/Arrangement: Nanahoshi Kangengakudan

subtitles.original: 誂えた業に乗せ
subtitles.english: Riding on a custom-made fate

subtitles.original: ひっそりと爪を研いでいる
subtitles.english: Quietly sharpening my claws

subtitles.original: 眠りさえ化け物に
subtitles.english: Even sleep becomes a monster

subtitles.original: 香り纏わせお前の喉に
subtitles.english: Wearing a scent, into your throat

subtitles.original: この身体のどこかに生まれ落ちたなら
subtitles.english: If I were born somewhere in this body

subtitles.original: 何者にも食せぬ 毒 毒 毒
subtitles.english: Uneatable by anyone - poison, poison, poison

subtitles.original: 似たような不真面目と嗅ぎ回られもしようが
subtitles.english: They might sniff around for similar insincerity

subtitles.original: 喉から手が出るほど 毒 毒 毒
subtitles.english: Craving it with all my soul - poison, poison, poison

subtitles.original: 嗚呼 蓮に蓮にと 構えていた
subtitles.english: Ah, prepared for anything,

subtitles.original: 両刃の剣
subtitles.english: a double-edged sword

subtitles.original: 切っ先に立って じっとしていられるのなら
subtitles.english: If you can stand on the tip and stay still

subtitles.original: のぞみは甘い
subtitles.english: Expectations are sweet

subtitles.original: Swallow Swallow その唇で
subtitles.english: Swallow, swallow, with those lips

subtitles.original: 深く患った病を もとめ啄む
subtitles.english: Seeking and pecking at a deeply rooted illness

subtitles.original: 願うまま茨を 着こなせればと
subtitles.english: Hoping I could wear the thorns as I wish

subtitles.original: 身柄が狩るのどを鳴らす
subtitles.english: My body purrs at the hunt

subtitles.original: 何食わぬ顔にさえ
subtitles.english: Even with an innocent face

subtitles.original: こっそり牙を宿していたい
subtitles.english: I want to secretly harbor fangs

subtitles.original: かじりつきたいだけで
subtitles.english: Just wanting to bite into it

subtitles.original: 吠えてはみてもお前のように
subtitles.english: Even if I bark, not like you

subtitles.original: その甲斐など何処に隠し持っていたのか
subtitles.english: Where were you hiding such worthiness?

subtitles.original: 五臓六腑を惑わせる 毒 毒 毒
subtitles.english: Confusing my very core - poison, poison, poison

subtitles.original: 悪し様に噂を そばだてられもしようが
subtitles.english: They might prick up their ears at ill-natured rumors

subtitles.original: 生唾滴るほど 毒 毒 毒
subtitles.english: Making mouths water - poison, poison, poison

subtitles.original: 嗚呼 善かり善かれと 紡いでいた
subtitles.english: Ah, a spoiled poisonous cup

subtitles.original: 甘ったれの毒杯
subtitles.english: spun for the sake of goodness

subtitles.original: 退廃に浸して 引導渡せるのなら
subtitles.english: If I can soak in decadence and say the final rites

subtitles.original: 此の世は辛い
subtitles.english: This world is bitter

subtitles.original: Swallow Swallow ただ渇いては
subtitles.english: Swallow, swallow, just thirsting

subtitles.original: 低く高笑った礼も 舌で転がす
subtitles.english: Rolling a low-pitched laugh of thanks on my tongue

subtitles.original: 手負いのまま路傍を はばたければと
subtitles.english: Hoping I could flap along the roadside while wounded

subtitles.original: 指をくわえ見ているか
subtitles.english: Are you watching with envy?

subtitles.original: 今日も今日とて
subtitles.english: Today, just like any other day

subtitles.original: 口元に修羅を塗りたくる
subtitles.english: Smearing battle onto my lips

subtitles.original: Swallow Swallow まだ耳元で
subtitles.english: Swallow, swallow, still at the ear

subtitles.original: 暗くぬかるんだ迷いも 束の間の影
subtitles.english: Dark, muddy hesitation is but a fleeting shadow

subtitles.original: 思うまま綺麗事を 抱きしめればと
subtitles.english: Hoping I could embrace platitudes as I wish

subtitles.original: 地べたを這う世界が 泣き止まぬまま
subtitles.english: While the world crawling on the ground won't stop crying

subtitles.original: Swallow Swallow その唇で
subtitles.english: Swallow, swallow, with those lips

subtitles.original: 深く患った病を もとめ啄む
subtitles.english: Seeking and pecking at a deeply rooted illness

subtitles.original: 願うまま茨を 着こなせればと
subtitles.english: Hoping I could wear the thorns as I wish

subtitles.original: 身柄が狩るのどを鳴らす
subtitles.english: My body purrs at the hunt
